pizzatower.name: Pizza Tower
pizzatower.heroParagraph: Pizza Tower is a high-octane platformer where you race through eclectic stages, smashing foes and searching for secrets as Peppino the pizza chef.
pizzatower.metaDescription: Play Pizza Tower online. Sprint as Peppino the pizza chef, combo through wild stages, and chase high scores in this fast-paced platformer. Free and unblocked!
pizzatower.metaKeywords: Pizza Tower, Peppino, fast platformer, speedrun game, retro inspired, play Pizza Tower online, unblocked

controls.action: dash, shoulder bash, and break blocks

quake3.name: Quake III Arena
quake3.heroParagraph: Quake III Arena is the definitive arena shooter—tight movement, deadly weapons, and nonstop competitive action.

slope2.name: Slope Two Player
slope2.heroParagraph: Slope 2 keeps the endless downhill rush alive with faster tracks, tougher hazards, and a pulse-pounding soundtrack.

adastra.name: Adastra
adastra.heroParagraph: Adastra blends space opera intrigue with heartfelt relationships in a branching visual novel experience.
